alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued June 01 at 9:32PM EDT until June 02 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Cumberland, Atlantic, Cape May, Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Coastal Atlantic and Coastal Ocean. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the dense fog is currently contained to the coastal counties this evening. The forecast is for the dense fog to push inland across Atlantic, Cape May, and Cumberland counties early Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland
